Question Type: from cause to effect without intervention
Explanation: Decreasing the temperature in the simulator beyond 18.0 degrees makes it more likely to rain (as per the willItRain method). Increased rain directly increases the number of people carrying umbrellas, according to the peopleCarryingUmbrellas method.
causal_map_integration: Temperature decreases → It will rain; It will rain → More people will carry umbrellas
